info.title: School Management System
info.description: This is a sample api documentation for a school management,which will be use as guide to fully document the api and use to develop the client application for this system.This documentation therefore makes use of an already built api found in swapi.dev

get.summary: Return a list of all person in the Star World universe
get.description: Get all people resources found in the Star world universe

get.summary: Return a schema for the people resource
get.description: A collection of all the properties and their datatype for a people resource

get.summary: Returns a list of all films
Returns a schema for tje film resource
get.description: A collection of all properties of the film resource

get.summary: Returns a list of all starships in the star world universe
Returns a schema for the starship resource
get.description: A collection of all the properties of a starship resource

get.summary: Returns a list of all vehicles in the star world universe
Returns a schema for the vehicle resource
get.description: A collection of properties of the vehicle resource

get.summary: Returns a list of all planets in the star world universe
Returns a schema for the planet resource
get.description: A collection of all properties of the planet resource

get.summary: Returns a list of all species in the star world universe
Returns a scheema for the species resource
get.description: A collection of all peoperties of the species resource

birth_year.description: The birth year of the person, using the in-universe standard of BBY or ABY - Before the Battle of Yavin or After the Battle of Yavin.

eye_color.description: THe eye color of the person

gender.description: The gender of this person. Either "Male", "Female" or "unknown", "n/a" if the person does not have a gender.

hair_color.description: The hair color of the person

height.description: The height of the person in centimeters

mass.description: THe mass of the perosn in kilograms

skin_color.description: The skin color of the person

homeworld.description: The URL of a planet resource, a planet that this person was born on or inhabits.

films.description: An array of film resource URLs that this person has been in.

species.description: An array of species resource URLs that this person belongs to.

starships.description: An array of starships resource URLs that this person belongs to.

vehicles.description: An array of vehicle resource URLs that this person has piloted.

created.description: The ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: The ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.
